title: QA Automation Engineer, Mid
description: Collaborate with cross-functional teams. Build reliable systems and contribute to reviews and documentation. Required: Python, PyTest, API testing, Kubernetes basics, telemetry/monitoring. Nice: Selenium/Playwright, Docker.
